thread.section_title: Homewood Suites by Hilton San Francisco Airport-North - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Brisbane, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Disabled Vietnam Veteran
thread.title_full: Disabled Vietnam Veteran - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton San Francisco Airport-North, Brisbane, CA - TripAdvisor

author: specialteacher00
title: Disabled Vietnam Veteran
text: With limited mobility it is imperative that I have a room close to an entrance or elevator. Unfortunately, they type of room I needed, with my wife, adult daughter and her husband, was only available the farthest distance from the entrance/elevator.
